attributes.action: Bring back the Borstals, populate them with Yobs.And give them a hard time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Borstal institutions were effective in reducing youth crime.
And where they weren't effective, at least it kept the Yobs off the streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
